product_name: NYX Professional MakeupButtermelt Pressed Powder Blush
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackDiscover Buttermelt Blush by NYX Professional Makeup! 12 shades of buttery smoothness that blend like powder, glide like butta in matte or glowy finishes!
details: DetailsBenefitsButtermelt Blush with booming pigment, butta blend, and butta wearButtermelt Blush comes in 12 shades that blend seamlessly like a powder and glide like butta, in soft matte and glowy finishesInfused with mango butter, almond butter, and shea butter, it doesn't get any butta than thisLayer over Buttermelt Bronzer for a warm natural sun-soaked bronzed look and make it butta togetherUp to 12 hours of pigmented wear, fade and transfer resistant. Vegan and cruelty free formulaFeaturesInfused with shea, mango and almond butterItem 2624632How To UseNeed a blush hack? Here's how to apply blush for a butta blend. Lightly tap your brush into the pan to pick up pigment, then swirl the brush on the high points of your cheek, around the temples, and even across the nose for a warm flush of blush. Layer over Buttermelt Bronzer for a warm natural sun-soaked bronzed look and make it butta together!IngredientsMica, Talc, CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, CI 77491 / Iron Oxides, Silica, Lauroyl Lysine, Trimethylsiloxyphenyl Dimethicone, CI 45410 / Red 28 Lake, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Zinc Stearate, Octyldodecanol, CI 15850 / Red 6, CI 15850 / Red 7 Lake, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides, Mangifera Indica Seed Butter / Mango Seed Butter, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Sunflower Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil / Sweet Almond Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter / Shea Butter, Aroma / Flavor, Caprylyl Glycol, Isostearyl Isostearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Linalool, Limonene (F.I.L. N70043625/1).
how_to_use: Need a blush hack? Here's how to apply blush for a butta blend. Lightly tap your brush into the pan to pick up pigment, then swirl the brush on the high points of your cheek, around the temples, and even across the nose for a warm flush of blush. Layer over Buttermelt Bronzer for a warm natural sun-soaked bronzed look and make it butta together!
ingredients: Mangifera Indica Seed Butter / Mango Seed Butter
Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Sunflower Seed Oil
Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil / Sweet Almond Oil

reviews.headline: Pigmented, buildable and blend able
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I loved these blushes! I was a bit scared that the color would be super dark on my skin but it wasn't. Super pigmented, blend able and buildable . Smells like chocolate and is a buttery texture that I love.

reviews.headline: Butter melt pressed powder blush
reviews.comments: I received the NYX Butter Melt Pressed Powder Blush in exchange for my honest review, and I really like it! The formula is smooth and blends out so easily without looking patchy. The color is buildable. Overall, a great blush at an affordable price.

reviews.headline: The perfect blush
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] 

How pretty this blush isüòç

Packaging is really cool, loved the vibeü©∑ It says it is a butter blush but it does feel a bit powdery which I enjoy better in a blush ‚úÖ It blends so nicely! I thought the shade was darker when I saw it because it says terracota but it looks just perfect!! As you can see, it has an amazing pigmentation, you only need a little bit of product and application is so easyü•∞ It has a pleasant scent which I enjoyed, it is very light so don't worry about strong fragrances

It has a glowing finish, I didn't need to apply highlighter afterwards, it looks BEAUTIFUL‚ú® and the best part, lasted all day long looking pretty and without looking cakey or cracked ‚úÖ

I need more shades! Loved it

reviews.headline: The best blush
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] You can't find better blush at this price point. I would even say this product beats more expensive ones. 
Unreal pigmentation, so easy to apply and it blends really well. 
Very beautiful pink shade "Butta together"

reviews.headline: Soft and buttery
reviews.comments: I am obsessed I needed a new blush. It feels so soft and buttery snd the pigment is crazy a little goes a long way. Its not pricey at all.  It has a bit of a baby smell its smells so good

reviews.headline: I love!!!!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I am loving this new blush. Super pigmented. You can blend very easily without harsh lines. I'm in love. i'm always looking for a good blush and this exceeded my expectations.

reviews.headline: It's worth it
reviews.comments: My new favorite! [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] So nicely made and smells great! I like the te texture and that the pigmentation is long lasting. It such a pretty product too, the printing and the packaging. I'd buy it again.

reviews.headline: Beautiful neutral
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is a soft, neutral, light, pinkish brown shade. It would look great on fair to light medium complexions. It blended into the skin seamlessly. It lasted pretty decent especially for how hot it has been.

reviews.headline: Beautiful scent and pink color!
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Thank you @influenster and @nyxcosmetics for sending me this amazing , beautiful, buttermelt blush for exchange for honest and true review.
First of all, it's beautiful , the design and everything.
Second of all, the scent, not sure if I'm describing well, but it's like a very pleasant coconut smell I fell in love with, very gentle!
Easy to apply, pinkish color, love it in my skin color, love the texture and the color. Checked the price and totally affordable!
Totally recommend! 
#complimentary #nyxcosmetics #nyxprofessionalmakeup #buttermeltblush

reviews.headline: Smooth and highly pigmented! 100% recommended
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] First of all gorgeous packaging, lovely lightly scented. Great price. Highly pigmented, great for any occasion of course, It fits my olive tan skin perfectly! 100% recommend! Smooth and highly pigmented.

reviews.headline: gorgeous color and texture
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] minimal scent and buttery texture makes for a nice blush. the color and pigmentation is absolutely beautiful here and for a good price this is worth it.

reviews.headline: Lasting color
reviews.comments: I have in the past bought 4 other colors in this. I love it! My work days begin very early and stays until later in the day. Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: blends like butter
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] this blush is so blendable and layers very well i took some of my bridal pics today and my makeup looked flawless this blends like butter and the pigment is perfect as well i got the shade butta together

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: I'm obsessed with NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP's Buttermelt Blush! The pigmentation is SUPER intense, and I love how it gives my cheeks a gorgeous, healthy-looking flush.The formula is creamy and blends beautifully, making it easy to apply and buildable for a natural or dramatic look. The shade range is amazing, and Buttermelt is a stunning color that adds warmth to my complexion.If you're looking for a blush that packs a punch, NYX's Buttermelt is a must-try!

reviews.headline: such a glowy sun-kissed look!
reviews.comments:
The Nyx Feeling Butta Butter Melt Blush gives a natural, dewy flush with its creamy, buildable formula.
NYX blushes are budget-friendly, offer great color payoff, and come in various shades and finishes.

reviews.headline: Dissatisfied
reviews.comments: Came in completely shattered I was looking forward to using it but it was completely destroyed if you're going to buy this make sure you get it in person and not online. I've heard multiple stories of people receiving it cracked so it seems to be a common scenario.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This blush works so well, the color is super pigmented, if you aren't careful it will go on super bright. The texture is buttery and smooth and just feels nice as you are applying it. I like that you can darken it or keep it lighter for makeup that is for just a regular day makeup and darken it for party or even performance makeup.

reviews.headline: Ordering more as we speak
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been using the NYX Professional Makeup Buttermelt Blush for a while now, and it's become one of my favorite blushes. The texture is incredibly smooth and buttery, almost like a cream, which makes it easy to blend and build up to the desired intensity. The pigment is impressive‚Äîjust a light tap with my brush gives me a beautiful flush of color that lasts all day without fading. The packaging is sleek and compact, making it perfect for travel or tossing into my bag for touch-ups. I also love the subtle, sweet scent‚Äîit's not overpowering but adds a nice touch. Overall, this blush offers high-end performance at a drugstore price, and I've been so impressed that I've already picked up a few more shades to add to my collection.

reviews.headline: Super cute blush
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is a very cute blush! This shade is super pretty, soft and feminine. Is very shiny and it gives a glow to your face. Easy to blend, nice packaging too.

media.headline: They really do feel like butter

faceoff_positive.comments:
The NYX Cosmetics Buttermelt Blush has made a splash in the beauty community, promising a "buttery soft" powder formula with high pigmentation and long-lasting wear. As a staple in the affordable makeup category, it's a product that has generated a lot of buzz. But does it live up to the hype? Here's a comprehensive review to help you decide.
‚ÄãTexture & Application
‚ÄãOne of the most notable features of this blush is its unique texture. Despite being a powder, it feels incredibly creamy and smooth to the touch, which is likely due to its formulation with mango, almond, and shea butters. This buttery feel translates to a product that glides effortlessly onto the skin.
‚ÄãHowever, this is where the experience can be a bit of a learning curve. Because of the high pigment and soft texture, a very light hand is essential. Many users have noted that tapping the brush once or twice into the pan is more than enough for both cheeks. Using a dense or angled brush seems to work best for picking up and blending the product without it becoming patchy. Some reviewers have even found that a damp beauty sponge gives a more airbrushed, dewy finish.
‚ÄãPigmentation & Longevity
‚ÄãTrue to its claims, the Buttermelt Blush is exceptionally pigmented. The color payoff is instant and vibrant, so a little product goes a very long way. This is great for achieving a bold look, but it can be challenging for those who prefer a more subtle flush. This intense pigmentation also means a single pan of blush could last for a very long time.
‚ÄãAs for longevity, the blush generally receives positive feedback. It is marketed as fade and transfer-resistant with up to 12 hours of wear, and many users agree that the color holds up well throughout the day. It maintains a healthy, fresh-looking glow for several hours without needing a touch-up.
‚ÄãPros and Cons
‚ÄãPros:
‚ÄãHigh Pigmentation: A little goes a long way, making the product a great value.
‚ÄãUnique Texture: The creamy, buttery formula blends smoothly and doesn't emphasize texture or pores.
‚ÄãLong-lasting: It has good staying power, often lasting for most of the day.
‚ÄãAffordable: It offers high-end quality at a drugstore price point.
‚ÄãGreat Shade Range: Available in a variety of shades with both soft matte and glowy finishes to suit many skin tones.
‚ÄãCons:
‚ÄãFragile Formula: Due to its soft, "buttery" consistency, the blush is very delicate and prone to cracking or breaking, especially if dropped.
‚ÄãLearning Curve: The intense pigmentation can be difficult to work with initially, and it requires a light hand to avoid a "clown-like" look.
‚ÄãStrong Scent: Some users are sensitive to the strong, sweet, and candy-like scent of the product.
‚ÄãExpiration: Some reports indicate a relatively short expiration period of six months, which can be an issue given how little product is needed for each use.
‚ÄãFinal Verdict
‚ÄãThe NYX Cosmetics Buttermelt Blush is a high-impact, high-value product that offers a stunning, long-lasting flush. While its intense pigmentation and fragile formula may present a challenge, the beautiful finish and affordable price make it a worthwhile addition to any makeup collection. It's perfect for those who want a vibrant blush that lasts all day and are willing to take a little extra care with its application and handling.
faceoff_positive.headline: Love it

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this product complimentary via influenster and the company itself in exchange for my honest review.  I was/am so excited to have been selected for this product to be sent to me. Unfortunately, I am met with disappointment as well due to Talc being in the ingredients. After learning how unhealthy it is I got rid of a ton of my cosmetics (I am a collector) because it is in so many,high end included! BUT I will say I'll be hanging on to this one for special occasions because it is just too pretty! It's a buttery smooth feel, almost like a cream but it's not. Super good pigmentation and also has a dewy sheen to it like a highlight. I rated it low because of the risk talc poses. If they can remove that I would buy every color and rate it much higher.
faceoff_negative.headline: Sad
